pullRequest.title: KEYCLOAK-14232 KEYCLOAK-15259 Add Referrer-Policy: no-referrer to each response from Keycloak

commit.message:
KEYCLOAK-14232 Add Referrer-Policy: no-referrer to each response from Keycloak

(cherry picked from commit 0b49640231abc6e465542bd2608e1c908c079ced)
KEYCLOAK-15259 Avoid using "null" Origin header as a valid value

nodes.bodyText: A more robust way would probably be something like driver instanceof HtmlUnitDriver. But since this is really just a nit pick and it's already merged in -prod repo, let's leave it this way to keep it consistent. ;)
This change will mean we don't add headers at all if the realm is missing headers
